title: Social Role-Based Learning Technology Design: Application to Online Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational digital literacy and understanding of elementary school curricula
context.additional_context: Learners (general citizens) acquire learning technology design methods reflecting social roles and engage in collaborative activities in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Analyze social roles of teachers and learners in real educational settings and apply findings to learning technology design
Evaluate interaction contexts among educational stakeholders using Positioning Theory
Develop at least two social role-based activity scenarios compliant with IMS Learning Design standards
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
